cocktails.name: Scotch on the Rocks
cocktails.description: Scotch whisky served with ice: a classic
cocktails.recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes|Pour in 2 oz of Scotch whisky

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: Lipsmackingly sweet and sour, the Cosmopolitan cocktail of vodka, cranberry, orange liqueur and citrus is a good-time in a glass.
cocktails.ingredients: Vodka(2 oz|Cointreau(1 oz|Cranberry Juice(1/2 oz|Fresh Sour Mix(1/2 oz|Lemon Twist (1
cocktails.recipe: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.|To make the garnish: hold a 3cm round piece of orange zest about 10cm above your cosmo and very carefully wave it over a lit match or lighter flame. Bend the outer edge of the zest in towards the flame so that the orange oils are released, then drop the zest into your drink.
